name: Lap/baby Quilt -pink/green-
description: This adorable quilt is made from high quality Moda fabrics and backed with a light pink solid backing. Handmade and quilted by the Tiny Seamstress. Wash on delicate and dry on low.

name: Lap Quilt - Navy/Emerald
description: This fun quilt is handmade by the Tiny Seamstress from the gorgeous Dear Stella fabrics. It measures approximately 57" by 44" and is quilted in a fun zig zag pattern.

name: The Mini Collection PDF Pattern
description:
This pattern will be automatically delivered to your email address that is listed on your paypal account. 

A mini version of 2 of your favorite Tiny Seamstress bags!

MATERIALS NEEDED - 
	The Mini Poppins Bag: 

¾ yard body fabric (big blue/white flowers)
¾ yard lining fabric (blue/white dots)
1/3 yard accent fabric (yellow)
¾ yard fusible fleece
4 – 1 ½” rectangle/round rings
1 magnetic snap  

	The Mini Glam Bag:
½ yard body fabric (red/white flowers)
½ yard lining fabric (red/white geometric)
1/3 yard accent fabric (solid red)
½  yard fusible fleece
1 magnetic snap
24” - ½” elastic
1 small safety pin for bow (optional)

Copyright October 2013 TINY SEAMSTRESS DESIGNS
Duplication or sharing of any kind is prohibited.

name: Barn Doors PDF Pattern
description:
This quilt will be delivered directly to your inbox address listed on your paypal account. There are no refunds on PDF patterns.

This quilt measures approximately 48”x 52” when finished.

A design inspired by barn doors, old and new.

MATERIALS NEEDED:
(5) 1/3 yard cuts in different prints
2 ½ yards white fabric
3 yards backing fabric
½ yard binding fabric 
50”by 55”batting

Fabric on cover:
Organic Free Range by Monaluna Fabrics

Copyright September 2013 TINY SEAMSTRESS DESIGNS
Duplication or sharing of any kind is prohibited.

name: Pixie PDF Pattern
description:
This pattern will be automatically sent to your paypal email address within minutes of your order being placed. There are no refunds on PDF purchases. 
Made especially for the little pixie in my life!

MATERIALS NEEDED:
12 patterned fat quarters (or (6) ½ yard prints cut in (2) 18” x 22”)
12 solid fat quarters (or (6) ½ yard prints cut in (2) 18” x 22”)
3 yards of fabric for backing
½ yard of fabric for binding 
50” x 65” batting

Fabrics on cover:
Gracie Girl by Riley Blake Designs
Solids by Riley Blake Designs

Copyright  September 2013 TINY SEAMSTRESS DESIGNS
Duplication or sharing of any kind is prohibited.

name: Pixie PAPER pattern
description:
This listing is for a hard copy of the Pixie quilt pattern that will be shipped directly to your address listed on your paypal account.

This quilt was inspired by the little pixie in my life and her magical fairy wings!

When finished this quilt measures approximately 44" x 60".

Materials Needed:
*12 patterned fat quarters -OR- (6) 1/2 yard prints
*12 solid fat quarters -OR- (6) 1/2 yard cuts
*3 yards fabric for backing
*1/2 yard fabric for binding
*50" x 65" batting

Copyright 2013 Tiny Seamstress Designs
Duplication or sharing of any kind is prohibited.

name: The Mini Collection PAPER Pattern
description:
This listing is for a hard copy version of the Mini Collection pattern that will be delivered directly to the address listed on your paypal account.

This is a mini version of two of your very favorite Tiny Seamstress bags...The Poppins Bag and The Jumbo Glam Bag! Both shrunk down to a handy tote or purse size version.

Materials Needed:
The Mini Poppins Bag-
*3/4 yard body fabric (big blue/white flowers)
*3/4 yard lining fabric (blue/white dots)
*1/3 yard accent fabric (yellow)
*3/4 yard fusible fleece
*(4) 1 1/2" rectangle/round rings
*1 magnetic snap

The Mini Glam Bag-
*1/2 yard body fabric (red/white flowers)
*1/2 yard lining fabric (red/white geometric)
*1/3 yard accent fabric (solid red)
*1/2 yard fusible fleece
*1 magnetic snap
*24" of 1/2" elastic
*1 safety pin for the bow

Copyright 2013 Tiny Seamstress Designs
Duplication or sharing of any kind is prohibited.

name: Barn Doors PAPER pattern
description:
This listing is for a hard copy version of the Barn Doors quilt and will be shipped to the address listed in your paypal account. 

This pattern is such a fun and simple project! It's easy cutting and piecing and comes with clear diagrams to follow. The finished quilt measures approximately 48" x 52". Perfect for a baby gift! A design inspired by barn doors old and new!

Materials Needed:
*(5) 1/3 yard cuts in different prints
*2 1/2 yards white fabric
*3 yards backing fabric
*1/2 yard binding fabric
*50" x 55" batting

Copyright 2013 Tiny Seamstress Designs
Duplication or sharing of any kind is prohibited.

name: The Poppins Bag - Peacock *last one*
description:
This bag is a designer favorite! I carry my Poppins bag everywhere and just can't seem to trade it for a new one. With 4 exterior pockets and two large interior pockets this bag can carry anything! Straps measure approximately 22" long, body measure about 20" wide, by 12" tall, by 3" wide, and comes with a magnetic snap closure. We've even added a little bling with high-quality silver rings. 
Please allow 7-14 days for shipping in the U.S.

name: Party Banner - 7 yards
description:
Includes 2 strands of navy/pink banner. One is just over 2 1/4 yards and the other is just over 4 3/4 yards. And if you want the banners to be shorter, just snip the threads! 
Both of these banners are gently used from my little girl's birthday party and they are still in perfect condition. I am listing them here at a discounted price.

name: The Shore BAG
description: This listing is for the actual Shore Bag! This bag will come with silver buckles instead of black like in the photo. This bag is perfect for the beach or for everyday with the kids. The ties on the side allow for expanding or cinching up. Straps are curved inward at the center for extra comfort and less bulk. Bag is approximately 15" tall by 21" wide with a 4" deep base. Straps are approximately 20" long. Fabric is navy stripes with orange flowers. Includes one large inside pocket, one outside pocket and a magnetic snap closure. Please allow 7-14 days for US shipping. Thanks so much!

name: The Shore BAG - Fuchsia
description: This bag is perfect for the beach or out on the town with kids. Measures approximately 15" tall by 20" wide with a 4" base. It has one large interior pocket (like the one shown in 2nd photo), one outside pocket, and a magnetic snap closure. The handles curve in towards the center for comfort and less bulk and measure about 20" long. The bag expands on the sides for extra bulk or can be cinched up with the cute ties for a smaller bag. Please allow 7-14 days for US shipping.

name: Oh Betsy BAG - Navy/Emerald
description: This adorable little tote is the perfect purse for every day. A trip to the grocery store, evening out with the husband... two handles make it easy to tote or carry across the shoulder to keep your hands free! There is one large interior pocket. Bag measures about 9" wide by 11" tall. Top can fold down for a second look. Please allow 7-14 days for U.S. delivery.

name: Sliders
description: This listing is for 4 sliders...perfect for making the Shore bag. They measure 1.5" wide and are silver. Please note that shipping is reduced when you purchase another item (such as the Shore bag pattern) with these.

name: Bye Bye Birdie PDF Pattern
description:
Please allow 24-48 hours for pattern to arrive. I will use your paypal email address unless otherwise noted.

This is an original/modern design with flare and fun for all ages! 72"x76" quilt.

Materials Needed:
*(9) 1/2 yard cuts of fabric for flowers 
  (or 18 fat quarters in matching sets of 2)
*1 yard of white fabric for background
*4.5 yards of fabric for backing
*1/2 yard fabric for binding
*80"x85" batting

Fabric on cover:
Notting Hill by Joel Dewberry for Free Spirit

Copyright 2013 Tiny Seamstress Designs
Duplication or sharing of any kind is prohibited.

Please allow 24-48 hours for your pattern to deliver. I will use the email address listed in your Paypal account unless otherwise noted.

description:

name: Oh Betsy! PDF Pattern
description:
Please allow 24-48 hours for this pattern to be emailed to the email address listed in your paypal account (unless otherwise noted). This is the perfect on the go bag for any woman or teen. Wear it across the chest or carry on the arm. When finished it measres 9" wide by 14" tall.

Materials Needed:

    -OR-
*7/8 yard body fabric (outside)
*1/2 yard lining fabric (inside)
    -AND-

*2 D-rings or O-rings
*2 hooks/clasps for long strap

Copyright 2013 Tiny Seamstress Designs
Duplication or sharing of any kind is prohibited.

name: Oh Betsy! PAPER Pattern
description:
This sassy pattern will be shipped directly to your front door within 5-7 business days. This is the perfect on the go bag for any woman or teen. Wear it across the chest or carry on the arm. When finished it measres 9" wide by 14" tall.

Materials Needed:

    -OR-
*7/8 yard body fabric (outside)

name: Shore Bag PDF Pattern
description:
Please allow 24-48 hours for this adorable PDF pattern to be emailed to you. It will be delivered to your Paypal email address, unless otherwise noted with your purchase.

Materials Needed:
*1 yard body fabric (blue/white stripes)
*1.5 yards lining fabric (orange flowers)
*1 yard fusible fleece
*(4) 1.5" metal or plastic sliders
*1 magnetic snap
*size 12-14 needle

Fabrics on cover:
Cabana stripe in navy by Shore Thing for Dear Stella
Aloha Flower in orangesicle by Lucy's Crab Shack for Moda

name: The Shore Bag PAPER Pattern
description:
PLEASE NOTE THAT YOU ARE BUYING THE INSTRUCTIONS TO MAKE THIS BAG AND NOT THE ACTUAL BAG.

This bag, when finished, is so perfect for anything and everything. Whether it's a trip to the beach or a stroll across town, this bag will work! It has one large pocket on the inside, one on the outside, curved handles for a cozy fit and expandable sides giving you 8" of stretch!

Measure 13" tall by 20" wide by 4" deep when finished.

The pattern includes clear instructions, illustrations and a template for the handles.

Materials Needed:
7/8 yard body fabric (blue/white stripes)
1 & 3/8 yard lining fabric (orange flowers)
1 yard fusible fleece
(4) 1.5" metal or plastic sliders
1 magnetic snap
size 12-14 needle

Fabrics used on the Shore Bag cover: 
Cabana Stripe in Navy - Shore Thing by Dear Stella
Aloha Flower in Orangesicle - Lucy's Crab Shack by Moda

Patterns are for personal use only. Not for duplication or resale of instructions or finished product.

This is a paper pattern and will be shipped to the address on your PayPal account. Please allow 3-7 days for delivery.

name: The Darling Bag PAPER Pattern
description:
PLEASE NOTE THAT YOU ARE BUYING THE INSTRUCTIONS FOR THIS BAG AND NOT THE ACTUAL BAG.

This sweet bag, when finished, is filled with character from the ruffles to the curves and everything in between. It's loaded with 10 pockets to carry all of the necessities and measures 12" tall by 20" wide by 5" deep when finished.

Comes complete with clear instructions and pattern templates.

Materials Needed:
1.25 yards fabric for body, straps, and back pockets
1.5 yards fabric for lining, straps, and inside pockets
1/2 yard fabric for ruffles
1.5 yard lightweight fusible fleece
1 magnetic snap

Patterns are for personal use only. Not for duplication or resale of pattern or finished product.
 
This paper pattern will be shipped directly to the address on your PayPal account! Please allow 3-7 days for delivery.

name: The Poppins Bag PAPER Pattern
description:
PLEASE NOTE THAT YOU ARE PURCHASING THE INSTRUCTIONS TO MAKE THIS BAG AND NOT THE ACTUAL BAG.

When finished this bag measures approximately 13" tall by 16" wide by 3" deep and 24" handles. There are 4 outside pockets, 5 inside pockets, a magnetic snap closure, and a child handle--perfect for keeping tabs on those little ones when out in public!

Materials Needed:
1½ yard body fabric 
(outside pockets, body, straps, child handle)
1¼ yard accent fabric
(scrunch, inside pockets, straps, pocket trim)
¾ yard lining fabric 
(inside body, sides, base)
1 yard fusible fleece
1 magnetic snap
4 - 2” rings
size 14 needle

This pattern is shipped directly to the address on your PayPal account. Please allow 3-7 days for delivery. 
Comes complete with clear instructions and pattern pieces.

name: Jumbo Glam Bag PAPER Pattern
description:
PLEASE NOTE THAT YOU ARE BUYING THE INSTRUCTIONS TO MAKE THIS BAG AND NOT THE ACTUAL BAG.

This is a hard copy pattern for a Jumbo Glam Bag. Measures approximately 21" by 14" tall when finished and is perfect for simply every occassion. Two inner pockets and one outer pocket with magnetic snap closure when finished. 

Materials Needed:
1 yard fabric (outside body)
1½ yard contrasting fabric (lining and bow)
¾ yard of ½” elastic
1 yard fusible fleece
Magnetic snap
Safety pin 

Product will ship directly to the address on your PayPal account. Please allow 3-7 days for delivery.

This pattern is for personal use only. Not for duplication or resale of pattern or finished product.

name: The Seamstressed Tote PAPER Pattern
description:
PLEASE NOTE THAT YOU ARE BUYING THE INSTRUCTIONS FOR THIS PATTERN AND NOT THE ACTUAL BAG.

This fun pattern will ship directly to you. It is complete with pattern pieces and clear instructions!
When finished this tote can be used as a purse, a sewing bag, a knitting bag, etc. There are four large outside pockets, a magnetic snap closure, and removable button straps!

name: The Owl Backpack PAPER Pattern
description:
PLEASE NOTE THAT YOU ARE BUYING THE INSTRUCTIONS FOR THIS PATTERN AND NOT THE ACTUAL BAG.

This fun pattern will ship directly to you! 
Your toddler will love having their very own backpack handmade by you! When finished this pack has one single across the chest adjustable strap. 
Pattern complete with clear instructions and template pieces.

name: The Tiny Clutch PAPER Pattern
description:
PLEASE NOTE THAT YOU ARE BUYING THE INSTRUCTIONS FOR THIS PATTERN AND NOT THE ACTUAL BAG.

This perfect little clutch is such a simple yet adorable design. The pattern is complete with templates and instructions. The abstract design and closure are certain to draw attention anywhere. Perfect for running cross town or date night with your hubbie. 
This pattern will be delivered right to you and is complete with clear instructions and pattern templates.

name: The Fabulous Bags PAPER Pattern
description:
PLEASE NOTE THAT YOU ARE BUYING THE INSTRUCTIONS FOR THIS PATTERN AND NOT THE ACTUAL BAG.

This is a hard copy pattern for the Fabulous Bags. This pattern includes two different bag patterns. Can fold down for a smaller bag and flap folds up for a larger bag.

name: Classy Sophisticated Bag PAPER Pattern
description:
PLEASE NOTE THAT YOU ARE BUYING THE INSTRUCTIONS FOR THIS PATTERN AND NOT THE ACTUAL BAG.

This pattern will be shipped directly to you. Complete with clear instructions and diagrams. 
This bag pattern is perfect for a diaper bag, tote, or whatever you're looking for. When finished, it's reversible, with a bow closure, two outside pockets and one inside.

name: Diaper Savvy PAPER Pattern
description:
PLEASE NOTE THAT YOU ARE BUYING THE INSTRUCTIONS FOR THIS PATTERN AND NOT THE ACTUAL PRODUCT.

This pattern comes complete with instructions for two diaper and wipe clutches. Each is designed to hold 3-4 diapers and wipes. With simple instructions and templates these patterns are perfect for baby gifts or for your own little one. 
Thie pattern will ship directly to you and is complete with clear, simple instructions and pattern templates!

name: Simply Legendary Bag PAPER Pattern
description:
PLEASE NOTE THAT YOU ARE BUYING THE INSTRUCTIONS FOR THIS PATTERN AND NOT THE ACTUAL BAG.

This is a hard copy pattern for my Simply Legendary Bag. This bag is pretty big and perfect for toting everywhere. Jam packed with pockets and comes complete with optional long or short straps.

name: Legendary Mini Bag PAPER Pattern
description:
PLEASE NOTE THAT YOU ARE BUYING THE INSTRUCTIONS FOR THIS PATTERN AND NOT THE ACTUAL BAG.

This cute pattern will be shipped directly to you with clear instructions and pattern templates.
When finished this is the perfect little purse to tote around town. Complete with a magnetic snap closure, two fun curvey straps, an outside pocket, and a fun flower!
Flower tutorial found on my blog: http://tinyseamstress.blogspot.com

name: Little Miss Business Bag PAPER Pattern
description:
PLEASE NOTE THAT YOU ARE BUYING THE INSTRUCTIONS FOR THIS PATTERN AND NOT THE ACTUAL BAG.

This adorable pattern will be shipped directly to you! This is a simple fun pattern perfect for all levels of sewing! 
When finished this bag is expandable with side snaps, has approximately 21" straps, and a fun ruffle top. This bag measures approximately 12" tall by 21" wide and is perfect for carrying (not protecting) a laptop and all other business needs!

name: A Little Scrunched Bag PAPER Pattern
description:
PLEASE NOTE THAT YOU ARE BUYING THE INSTRUCTIONS FOR THIS PATTERN AND NOT THE ACTUAL BAG.

This bag pattern is a hard copy that will be mailed to your home. This pattern is fun to make and filled with character. This sweet purse has two inner pockets, a magnetic snap closure, and a super fun scrunched outer pocket when finished. Complete with templates and photos to follow along. Certain to bring compliments!!!

name: Funky Chicken PAPER Pattern
description:
PLEASE NOTE THAT YOU ARE BUYING THE INSTRUCTIONS FOR THIS PATTERN AND NOT THE ACTUAL PRODUCT.

This fun pattern comes complete with instructions for making the perfect baby quilt and a fun stuffed chicken, that lays eggs (pocket in the back to store eggs). This pattern will be shipped directly to you!
